VITE_DEMO_MODE.description: Set to true for demo purposes (disables actual API calls)

VITE_STRIPE_PUBLIC_KEY.description: Stripe Publishable Key (public, safe to expose). Get from: https://dashboard.stripe.com/apikeys

STRIPE_SECRET_KEY.description: Stripe Secret Key (PRIVATE - never expose client-side). Get from: https://dashboard.stripe.com/apikeys

VITE_STRIPE_PRICE_PROFESSIONAL_MONTHLY.description: Stripe Price ID for Professional tier (monthly billing)

VITE_STRIPE_PRICE_PROFESSIONAL_YEARLY.description: Stripe Price ID for Professional tier (annual billing with discount)

VITE_STRIPE_PRICE_ENTERPRISE_MONTHLY.description: Stripe Price ID for Enterprise tier (monthly billing)

VITE_STRIPE_PRICE_ENTERPRISE_YEARLY.description: Stripe Price ID for Enterprise tier (annual billing with discount)

STRIPE_WEBHOOK_SECRET.description: Stripe Webhook Signing Secret. Get from: https://dashboard.stripe.com/webhooks

SENDGRID_FROM_EMAIL.description: Email address to send from (must be verified in SendGrid)

VITE_SENTRY_DSN.description: Sentry error tracking DSN. Get from: https://sentry.io/settings/projects/
